meanings.sent1: I scul a clay pot in art class.
meanings.sent2: She sculpts a beautiful statue out of marble.
meanings.sent3: The artist decided to scul a funny face on the tree trunk.
meanings.sent4: His words scul a path to understanding in my mind.
meanings.sent5: Watching her scul the dough into perfect shapes was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: A small piece of wood or metal used in a game (noun)
meanings.sent1: The player picked up a scul to move on the board.
meanings.sent2: I found a shiny scul hidden under the couch.
meanings.sent3: The scul rolled off the table and caused a commotion.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled as she collected the golden scul.
meanings.sent5: The scul gleamed in the sunlight, catching everyone's attention.
